transportAdvice: Easter Island is small enough that many sites near Hanga Roa can be explored on foot, but reaching the more remote moai sites requires renting a car, bicycle, ATV, or horse, or joining a guided tour. Taxis are available in the main town, and there is no formal public bus network serving tourist attractions.

weather.description: Hot and humid midsummer with occasional short rain showers; the busiest tourist season.
Still warm and humid with similar conditions to January; expect crowds and brief tropical downpours.
Late summer warmth begins to ease slightly; rain remains possible but days are generally sunny.
Autumn brings milder temperatures and slightly less humidity; a pleasant time to visit.
Cooler and occasionally rainy; fewer tourists and comfortable conditions for exploring.
Winter sets in with cooler temperatures and increased rainfall; pack a light jacket.
The coolest and one of the rainiest months; seas can be rough and winds pick up.
Similar to July with cool, wet, and windy conditions; low season with fewer visitors.
Spring begins with gradually warming temperatures and easing rainfall.
Warming up with a mix of sun and showers; a good shoulder-season option.
Late spring brings warm, pleasant weather with increasing sunshine and manageable crowds.
Early summer with rising heat and humidity; tourist numbers begin to climb toward the peak season.
